snippet: Malaysia Airlines has scrapped the title of a competition asking people what activities and destinations are on their "bucket list," acknowledging it was inappropriate given the two deadly disasters it has suffered this year....

headline.print_headline: Malaysia Airlines Scraps 'Bucket List' Promo Title
headline.main: Malaysia Airlines Scraps 'Bucket List' Promo Title

lead_paragraph: Malaysia Airlines has scrapped the title of a competition asking people what activities and destinations are on their "bucket list," acknowledging it was inappropriate given the two deadly disasters it has suffered this year.
